fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Crimson Moon's Semblance__
Signature BiS.

__Primordial Jade Winged-Spear__
Same base stats as signature and provides ATK with passive.

__Staff of Homa__
Good 5* stat stick with CD and ATK.

__Staff of Scarlet Sands__
Good for vape. Use EM sands.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Deathmatch and Ballad of the Fjords__
Obtained via Battle Pass. Decent CRIT stat sticks. Ballad's EM is more useful in vape teams.

__Calamity Queller, Vortex Vanquisher__
5* ATK% Stat sticks

__Missive Windspear R5__ 
Event weapon from 3.1. Passive gives ATK and EM.

__Dragon's Bane R5__
Decent for vape and provides substatial DMG bonus at R5. Low base ATK is a downside.

__Lithic Spear R5, White Tassel R5, Blackcliff Pole__
Other F2P options.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK%|<goblet> Pyro DMG or ATK%|<circlet> CRIT DMG or CRIT RATE

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Normal Attack: Invitation to a Beheading
**2)** Burst: Balemoon Rising and Skill: All Is Ash

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Little ER needed since bursting is optional. 

Burst healing does not scale on talent level so levelling burst is not really necessary. 

Shimenawa's Reminiscence 4pc is not reccomended since most of the buff uptime is used up when Arlecchino is off field.
